alert.note: Alert for Huntington; Miami; Wabash (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 8:41PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wabash, southern Huntington and north central Miami Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 841 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Andrews to near Wabash to 8 miles northeast of Peru. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Wabash, Andrews, La Fontaine, Warren, Lancaster, Erie, Denver, Roann, Lagro, Mount Etna, Chili, Richvalley, Servia, Lincolnville, Plum Tree, Urbana, Speicherville, Treaty and Majenica. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 273 and 282. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
